job_history.work_description: Responsible for the daily oversight operations of the call center, monitoring average call handle time (ACHT), telephone service factor (TSF), and adherence to schedules. Supervise bargaining unit employees in joint efforts with the (UAW) union. Manage Walk- In staff and their schedules to service incoming customers. Assist in the assessment, development, implementation, and ongoing reporting of operational improvements as they relate to customer service metrics and process improvements of the call center.

Recruited, trained and managed the clinical medical staff and customer service representatives. Directed medical receptionist operations, including scheduling, transportation protocols, and patient satisfaction. Collected and secured patient co-pays and deductibles. Improved patient attendance rates by 20%. Responsible for developing and implementing patient and retention strategies. Improved processes to ensure accurate electronic billing and reimbursement.

Developed new and retained existing relationships with client base, resulting in 65% retention and 10% new membership leads. Conducted in-service training to office/home managers regarding organizational protocols. Completed weekly reports for nurse practitioners and physicians. Verified client information to ensure proper insurance information and resolved customer service issues.

Advanced to increasingly responsible positions, culminating in management role with oversight for a state certified Group home. Directed 12 employees and managed inventory, merchandise and cost controls resulting in 20% annual savings. Maintained high standards in sanitation and safety and complied with regulatory guidelines.

skills.name: Leadership
skills.explanation: Has extensive experience in leadership roles, including supervising bargaining unit employees, managing clinical medical staff, and directing medical receptionist operations, indicating expert-level mastery.

skills.name: Operational Management
skills.explanation: Has experience in managing daily operations of a call center, including monitoring key performance indicators and implementing process improvements, showing strong proficiency.

skills.name: Customer Service
skills.explanation: Has experience in managing customer service representatives, resolving customer service issues, and improving patient satisfaction, indicating strong proficiency.

skills.name: Project Management
skills.explanation: Has experience in developing and implementing patient retention strategies, improving processes for electronic billing and reimbursement, and conducting in-service training, showing a solid working proficiency.

skills.name: Time Management
skills.explanation: Has experience in managing schedules, monitoring adherence to schedules, and ensuring timely completion of tasks, indicating a solid working proficiency.

skills.name: Communication
skills.explanation: Has experience in communicating with employees, customers, and stakeholders, including developing and implementing patient retention strategies, showing a solid working proficiency.

skills.name: Healthcare Administration
skills.explanation: Has experience in managing clinical medical staff, directing medical receptionist operations, and improving patient attendance rates, indicating strong proficiency.

skills.name: Financial Management
skills.explanation: Has experience in managing inventory, merchandise, and cost controls, but the extent of financial management experience is limited, indicating some practical experience.
